Test.Name: ptz0: Correct response
Test.Description: Check NVT PTZ NODE test when DUT return correct response.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
PTZ-1-1-2 PTZ NODE
STEP 1 - Getting PTZ service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to PTZ service PTZ service address: http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServicePTZ20/PtzService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Getting PTZ nodes Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Validating GetNodes response STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Getting PTZ node [token=ptz0] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Validating PTZ node STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

TEST FAILED

TEST FAILED
